title: Add “Schedule today” section with external Google Form link on Daily Dashboard

requirements.summary: Add a clearly labeled “Schedule today” section on the Daily Dashboard (/) with a safe external link opening the provided Google Form in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Daily Dashboard page (frontend/src/pages/DailyDashboard.tsx), there is a clearly labeled section titled “Schedule today”.
The section includes a clickable link (or button) that opens https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform.
The link opens in a new browser tab/window and uses safe external-link attributes (e.g., rel="noopener noreferrer" when applicable).
All user-facing text added for this section is in English.

file_operations.description: Add a new UI section titled “Schedule today” within the Daily Dashboard page content. Include a visible, clearly clickable external link (or button-styled anchor) pointing to https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxpu1-1IO77u1JSIYvige65225NJq5bRUSKVnHO7C3N_Nd2Q/viewform, opening in a new tab via target="_blank" and using rel="noopener noreferrer" for safe external navigation. Ensure all added text is English and do not embed the form (no iframe) or add new navigation items.
